title: OCS team LF TOP/JG (D3+)
body:
TMB OCS is in relegations Friday week and we are LF a top and jg to play for us.

Add le bambi for further details

replies.body: I'm a high master / Low Challenger player from euw in In I'm interested in playing for your team email me marcelmuehlhausx96@gmx.de
